name: Statera (Johannes Witt, Mitha, pjuhl, loumigames)
description:
Statera was developed by Michelle Than, Philipp Juhl, Emma Louise Steiner, and Johannes Witt as part of our three week experimental game jam in our fourth semester. Thanks for the support of our coaches Prof. Thomas Bremer and Prof. Susanne Brandhorst at the DE:HIVE institue in Berlin.

Spoiler: The game is so slow that we implemented I and O as time cheat keys...
